about_the_game:
Play as Cosimo, a pizza delivering vampire living in a demon infested medieval Italy. Choose your delivery routes and upgrade your magical carriage. Save your family pizzeria from certain doom by slicing your way through levels, defeating challenging bosses, uncovering secrets and exploring the world of the Dark Dark Ages.

DELIVER PIZZA

... to hungry demon custumers inspired by medieval Italian folklore with a cartoony twist.


DOUBLE PROTAGONIST ACTION

Defeat wave after wave of monsters by using both your rage-powered carriage and your vampire abilities for unique combat opportunities. Constantly moving, high speed levels will keep you on your toes, always dodging and platforming.


HELP YOUR FAMILY

You dream of exploring exotic lands, living adventures and enjoying the freedom of the road, just like your father Count Pappi used to do.
Sadly, you are stuck at home, and your fate is tied to the success (or demise) of your family’s pizzeria. The job is even more difficult now that your dad’s nemesis, Barone Calzone, has resurfaced, sending all of his goons your way. Reconnect with your family and meet a cast of silly vampires and demons. Conquer the roads, deliver pizza and gain your freedom!


DRIVE AND GUN

The roads are dangerous and full of unsatisfied customers, not to mention the Barone's goons. Sometimes your deliveries will fail. Lucky for you, your family is there to help you acquire temporary and permanent upgrades.
